original_text: And if his father have no brethren, then ye shall give his inheritance unto his kinsman that is next to him of his family, and he shall possess it: and it shall be unto the children of Israel a statute of judgment, as the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 그의 아버지의 형제도 없으면 그의 기업을 가장 가까운 친족에게 주어 받게 할지니라 하고 나 여호와가 너 모세에게 명령한 대로 이스라엘 자손에게 판결의 규례가 되게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: And if his father have no brethren
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그의 아버지에게 형제가 없다면

sentences.original_text: then ye shall give his inheritance
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 그의 유산을 주어야 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: unto his kinsman that is next to him
and it shall be unto the children of Israel
